fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Send clean water to someone's house. If they have Defense of any kind, it will be increased by 1 tier.
- Send dirty water to someone's house. If they have Defense of any kind, it will be reduced by 1 tier.
- Pollute the entire town's water supply. EVERYONE's Defense will be reduced to None, and all attempts to raise it will have no effect.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- None of your abilities will notify your targets.
- All of your abilities are Astral.
- You may only pollute the town's water supply once.
